name: Judy Payne
text: I was able to order pizza for my colleagues to help them get through Black Friday! The online portal was easy to use and intuitive. Plus, I love the pizza at Pizza Hut! Thank you.

name: Roland Bustin
text: Much love to the hut!! Placed an order while in route to deliver at a near by store. Young lady that took my order was great! Even offered a recommendation when I didnt feel like I had my order complete. Nacho-cajun fries!! Amazing!! ‚Ä¶More

name: Tracy Roberts
text: The quality and service were great. My food was ready on time, and the gentleman at the drive thru window verified my order and sides without having to request it.

name: Angie !!
text: I will never order pizza hut again. We were the only car we had to sit and wait for our order at the carryout window. Everyone was getting their order but us. They finally walked it out to us 25 mins later. The pizza boxes were cold and ‚Ä¶More

text: No delivery to 4 mile radius!!!!! Please read all pictures and reviews. The senior general manager is telling me Google maps is wrong? Where did you get 12 mins? Worst part is, you can't even take any direction on that map and make 12 mins. ‚Ä¶More

text: Quick service and when I asked for plates she gave me plates in a bag along with napkins and condiments.

text: They are always quick with delivery. The pizza is usually piping hot and the wings were delish (not soggy, firm and tender).

text: Every time I have gotten a pizza from pizza hut, it has been consistenly horrible. It used to be good but the past 5-6 times I always end up regretting it. Not sure what happened to their recipes, but I'm done coming here. The staff is always courteous, friendly & helpful though.

text: The service was excellent!  More than excellent.  The food was ok, the peaches on the salad bar we're way past their prime, almost to wine.  Otherwise it was a nice meal.

text: support a local Mom & Pop pizza shop instead. You'll get a better quality and better tasting pizza as well as support your local economy.
